1.name: The Birth of a Nation
1.description: The Stoneman family finds its friendship with the Camerons affected by the Civil War, both fighting in opposite armies. The development of the war in their lives plays through to Lincoln's assassination and the birth of the Ku Klux Klan.

2.name: Les vampires
2.description: An intrepid reporter and his loyal friend battle a bizarre secret society of criminals known as The Vampires.

3.name: Alice in Wonderland
3.description: Alice goes with her sister to a picnic and then she falls asleep and starts dreaming about a wonderland full of talking animals and walking playing cards.

4.name: The Cheat
4.description: A venal, spoiled stockbroker's wife impulsively embezzles $10,000 from the charity she chairs and desperately turns to a Burmese ivory trader to replace the stolen money.

5.name: The Golem
5.description: In this version of the golem legend, the golem, a clay statue brought to life by Rabbi Loew in 16th century Prague to save the Jews from the ongoing brutal persecution by the city's rulers,...                See full summary »

7.name: A Fool There Was
7.description: A married diplomat falls hopelessly under the spell of a predatory woman.

8.name: Fanchon, the Cricket
8.description: A young wild girl Fanchon ( Mary Pickford ) lives in a forest with her eccentric grandmother who is suspected by the villagers of being a witch. The unkempt Fanchon suffers from her ...                See full summary »

9.name: Hypocrites
9.description: The parallel stories of a modern preacher and a medieval monk, Gabriel the Ascetic, who is killed by an ignorant mob for making a nude statue representing Truth, which is also represented by a ghostly naked girl who flits throughout the film.

10.name: Carmen
10.description: In order to help her smuggler kinsmen, a sultry gypsy seduces and corrupts an officer of the Civil Guard turning him into a traitor and murderer.

11.name: The Juggernaut
11.description: This silent film presents drama to prevent a train from falling from a damaged railroad bridge.

12.name: Madame Butterfly
12.description: The story of a Japanese woman and the tragedy that ensues when she loves an American naval officer.

13.name: The Regeneration
13.description: A boy surrounded by violence grows up to become an infamous gangster.

14.name: The Golden Chance
14.description: Mary Denby becomes a seamstress after her husband Steve wastes their money on booze. Her employer provides her as an escort to accompany millionaire Roger Manning. Her husband tries ...                See full summary »

15.name: Civilization
15.description: Christ takes on the form of a pacifist count to end a senseless war.

16.name: Filibus
16.description: Skypirate Filibus commits robberies from her airship, while a dedicated detective attempts to put a stop to it.

17.name: The Diamond from the Sky
17.description: This serial told the story of the diamond heir loom of the Stanley family.

21.name: The Captive

22.name: The White Sister
22.description: A young woman chooses to enter the convent after losing her lover.

23.name: The Undesirable
23.description: Betty (Lili Berky, Duel For Nothing), a young woman living in the country, is told by her dying father that he is really her uncle and raised her as his own when her mother was sent to ...                See full summary »

24.name: Martyrs of the Alamo
24.description: The story of the defense of the mission-turned-fortress by 185 Texans against an overwhelming Mexican army in 1836.

25.name: Ghosts
25.description: Helen and Manders are in love and wish to marry. Her parents object to his poverty and want her to marry Alving, a notorious rake, who is wealthy and powerful. Manders protests. The family ...                See full summary »

26.description: Assunta Spina is a tragedy set in Naples at the beginning of the twentieth century. Assunta and Michele are in love but others come between them and there is much jealousy. They fight and ...                See full summary »

27.name: The Clemenceau Case
27.description: Bara as the wife-vampire - her third picture.

29.name: Trilby
29.description: A hypnotic Svengali controls the singing voice of a young starlet, but he cannot control her heart.

31.name: The Italian
31.description: An immigrant leaves his sweetheart in Italy to find a better life across the sea in the grimy slums of New York. They are eventually reunited and marry. But life in New York is hard and ...                See full summary »

35.name: Inspiration
35.description: A young sculptor searches for the perfect model to inspire his work.

36.name: The Arab
36.description: An old sheik punishes his son Jamil for robbing a caravan by giving his horse to the wronged merchant. The horse is sold to a Turkish general then given to a Christian missionary Mary ...                See full summary »

37.name: The Dawn of a Tomorrow
37.description: A young girl who lives in the slums of London, is in love with a cunning thief. She persuades him to give up his life of crime. Meanwhile, an eccentric millionaire, who has been diagnosed ...                See full summary »

38.description: Young Romance, released in 1915, is a recent rediscovery that forever silences the claim that refined comedy cannot be conveyed via the screen. This disguise plot, worthy of an Elizabethan ...                See full summary »

39.name: Camille

40.name: The Lamb
40.description: Gerald, the somewhat frail son of a wealthy New York family, is bested at the beach by Bill, a strapping young cowboy from Arizona. His fiancée Mary, ashamed of Gerald's "yellow streak", ...                See full summary »

42.description: Enemy agents under the leadership of "Emanon" conspire with pacifists to keep the American defense appropriations down at a time when forces of the enemy are preparing to invade. The ...                See full summary »

43.name: A Girl of Yesterday
43.description: A girl with old-fashioned values becomes a modern sophisticate.

44.name: Kindling
44.description: Pregnant tenement dweller Maggie Schultz is being used by burglars and fears that though "I stole to keep my baby from being born in this rat hole... now he's going to be born in jail." But the tenement owner may refuse to prosecute.

45.name: The Dictator
45.description: Brooke Travers, a young society man of a roving disposition and much leisure, gets into a cab with his valet and his trunks, to go to his yacht for a cruise. Arriving at the pier, the ...                See full summary »

46.name: War and Peace
46.description: Napoleon's tumultuous relations with Russia including his disastrous 1812 invasion serve as the backdrop for the tangled personal lives of five aristocratic Russian families.

47.name: Far from the Madding Crowd
47.description: A girl farmer weds a faithless sergeant who is killed by her suitor, and realises she loves the bailiff.

48.name: The Pretty Sister of Jose

50.name: The Whirl of Life
50.description: The plot is a loose autobiographical interpretation of the life of Vernon and Irene Castle, interspersed among a typical melodrama of the period
